PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-02562010-03-11HEALTH,  ,  ,  , 
ActHazardous Products Act
SubjectOrder Amending Schedule I to the Hazardous Products Act (bisphenol A)
PrecisOrder Amending SCHEDULE I TO THE HAZARDOUS PRODUCTS ACT (bisphenol A), in order to enhance the health and safety of newborns and infants up to the age of 18 months by reducing their risk of developing adverse health effects as a result of exposure to bisphenol A. This will be accomplished by eliminating one of their sources of exposure by using the Hazardous Products Act to prohibit the advertisement, sale or importation of polycarbonate baby bottles that contain bisphenol A.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0053 Publication Date: 2010-03-31
